about_the_game:
With magic, dragons, and a touch of nostalgia, Firefly Cove is a cozy open-ended magic ranch RPG! You’ve been brought to a parallel dimension by the spirit of the forest; welcomed by this magical town’s charming citizens, with whispers of a legend come true. Legends say there is one powerful enough to restore the balance of the nature spirits, become a dragon kin, and discover the ominous secret of the dragon city ruins. Can you learn the magical way, become a great magician, make lots of new friends, and make Firefly Cove your home?

BE A PART OF THE COMMUNITY
Become friends with the citizens of Hotaru Village. Everyone has a story for you to discover or an adventure to go on. With hours of entertaining, heartfelt, comedic, and well written stories. Take part in the seasonal events and celebrations like the Dance of the Fireflies, the Night Market, and more!

BECOME A GREAT MAGE
Hone your elemental magic abilities with magical attacks, water bending, and more! Show your accomplishments in the Dragon Temple, and by bringing balance to the nature spirits, you can earn the heart of a dragon giving you the ability to shape-shift into a dragon.

DEVELOP YOUR SKILLS
Use different elemental magics to farm, forage, mine, and more! Progress your abilities and choose your specializations.

DISCOVER THE DRAGON CITY RUINS
Explore a vast area full of tough enemies, various environments, and discover the secrets of this ruined city. Use magic wands or shape-shift into a dragon to fend off your enemies and solve puzzles. Fight corrupted dragons in challenging boss fights.

MORE WAYS TO PLAY
Enjoy playing by yourself or with friends in single player and multiplayer mode with cross-play and split-screen.

ENJOY FULL IMMERSION
Composed by @Luxid, experience the brightest and darkest moments of an immersive original soundtrack designed to be enjoyed whether you're playing the game or listening on your own.
